metadata.Description: Organizations that are part of the United Nations system and work on various global issues.

level 1.Description: UN agencies employ renewable energy experts to provide technical assistance and expertise in promoting sustainable energy practices.
UN agencies collaborate with civil society organizations to foster partnerships and promote sustainable energy initiatives at the grassroots level.
UN agencies support energy access programs to ensure that underserved communities have access to clean and affordable energy sources.
UN agencies administer climate finance to support sustainable energy projects and initiatives in developing countries.
UN agencies measure the energy efficiency performance of countries and provide recommendations for improvement.
UN agencies align their efforts in the sustainable energy sector with the Sustainable Development Goals to promote global sustainability.
UN agencies are an instance of international organizations that work towards promoting sustainable energy practices and addressing global challenges.

level 2.Subject: renewable energy agencies
level 2.Description: Renewable energy agencies employ experts in the field of renewable energy to drive innovation and promote the adoption of clean energy technologies.

level 2.Subject: renewable energy agencies
level 2.Description: Renewable energy agencies collaborate with research institutions to advance scientific knowledge and develop new technologies for renewable energy generation.

level 2.Subject: climate finance mechanisms
level 2.Description: Climate finance mechanisms implement building standards that promote sustainable and energy-efficient construction practices.

level 2.Subject: climate finance mechanisms
level 2.Description: Climate finance mechanisms provide funding for renewable energy projects to support the transition to clean and sustainable energy sources.

level 2.Subject: energy efficiency
level 2.Description: Energy efficiency measures address energy waste by promoting the use of energy-efficient technologies and practices.

level 2.Subject: energy efficiency
level 2.Description: Energy efficiency collaborates with industries to develop and implement energy-saving measures and technologies.

level 2.Subject: regional energy organizations
level 2.Description: Regional energy organizations implement energy efficiency policies to promote sustainable energy practices.

level 2.Subject: regional energy organizations
level 2.Description: Regional energy organizations focus on improving energy access in underserved areas to ensure equitable distribution of sustainable energy resources.

level 3.Subject: renewable energy agencies
level 3.Description: Renewable energy agencies employ experts in the field of renewable energy to drive innovation and promote the adoption of clean energy technologies.

level 3.Subject: energy storage
level 3.Description: Energy storage addresses the issue of intermittency in renewable energy sources by storing excess energy for use during periods of low generation.

level 3.Subject: renewable energy certificates
level 3.Description: Renewable energy certificates are implemented by the Energy Efficiency Policy to promote the use of renewable energy sources.

level 3.Subject: energy cooperatives
level 3.Description: Energy cooperatives address energy poverty by providing affordable and sustainable energy solutions to underserved communities.
